code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{format,setWeek}from'date-fns';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import ListaRequisitos from'../Home/ListaRequisitos';import"./Apply.css";import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Apply=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[vaga,setVaga]=useState();const buscarVaga=async id=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/vagas_dev/".concat(id));setVaga(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Erro ao buscar vaga:',error);}};useEffect(()=>{buscarVaga(id);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:vaga&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"title",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://via.placeholder.com/120",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"website",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:vaga.nome_empresa}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{href:"https://portifolio-seven-wine.vercel.app/content/index.html",target:"_blank",children:[vaga.nome_empresa,".com"]})," "]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cabecalho_vaga",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"data",children:format(new Date(vaga.data_pub),'dd-MM-yyyy')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:vaga.cargo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"local",children:vaga.localidade})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",children:"Aplicar para a vaga"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:vaga.descricao}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListaRequisitos,{id:id},id)]})]})});};export default Apply;
